pages.text: Hi! I'm Sunday. I'm your robot friend.
Today is my first day at home.
This is our comfy sofa. Plop!
Here's a bright window. The sun says hello.
I see our bookshelf. So many stories!
And a chess table. Want to play later?
Tap my head to hear me beep! Beep-boop!
I can dance. Wiggle, wiggle!
I can listen when you read.
I can cheer when you try your best.
I can learn with you every day.
I'm happy you're here. Let's be friends.

title: Hydrate Hero: Sunday Saves the Day

pages.text: Beep! It's water time.
My tank needs water, and so do you!
Sip, sip. Ahh, that's fresh.
Water helps brains think fast.
Water helps bodies run and jump.
Let's fill a bottle together.
Great! We reached halfway.
Almost there—keep going!
Full! You're a Hydrate Hero!
High-five, splash style!
Let's set a gentle reminder.
Sip again later. Your body thanks you.
Tap, tap. The chessboard is ready.
Pawns are tiny travelers. Step, step.
The rook zooms in straight lines.
The bishop slides on the colors.
The knight hops like an L. Boing!
The queen is super strong. Wow!
The king is careful. Keep him safe.
We say "Good move!" to be kind.
Try your best. Think, then tap.
If it's tricky, breathe in… out.
Win or learn—both are great.
Your turn, friend. Let's play!
